name: layoutGlyphs(in:startingAtGlyphIndex:maxNumberOfLineFragments:nextGlyphIndex:)
desc: Lays out glyphs in the specified layout manager starting at a specified glyph.DeprecatedUse layoutCharacters(in:for:maximumNumberOfLineFragments:) instead.
declaration:
func layoutGlyphs(in layoutManager: NSLayoutManager, 
startingAtGlyphIndex startGlyphIndex: Int, 
maxNumberOfLineFragments maxNumLines: Int, 
   nextGlyphIndex nextGlyph: UnsafeMutablePointer<Int>)
